title: How to start learning the service portal of ServiceNow in the best way - Quora

response.answer_text: Register on http://developer.servicenow.com (It's free) & you can try taking up the Service Portal course that got added recently for a basic understanding of the Portal. You can also get your own instance to play around. Make it your playground :) ServiceNow Service Portal is a brilliant feature that's integrated with ServiceNow. You can drag & drop stuff. It's has two levels No Code — Common sense needed. Drag & drop with text typing.Developer — Need Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JS, AJAX at leastIt also requires one to understand the basic functionality of ServiceNow with a good hold on the tables & columns. To begin start with a basic HTML, CSS& JS course. This will give you a good understanding of ServiceNow Portal & will get you pumped up for more exploration. You don't need to be a genius, just curious & some passion will get you places as most of code or widgets are available on ServiceNow Community. ServiceNow Community is a great place with loads of great minds & talents. Most of them will help you with any query you have. Try cloning existing widgets, use the table structure of ServiceNow. View XML on a record gives you a brilliant way to see which field maps to where & so on. Try to build a Portal out of scratch, there are a few themes available. Try Service Portal Tutorials, Themes and Widgets for ServiceNow - ServicePortal.io, it's a great place to learn. I started with the web & it's fascinating what you can do with all the knowledge out there. Let me know if I can help anyway, would be great learning together. Best of Luck & Happy Learning :)
You can learn service now using service now developer site.create your own instance and start learning from there.
